scripts.commands: npm run rebuild ios ipa; npm run rebuild android apk; npm run binaryios; npm run binaryandroid; npm run usbAndroid;
scripts.rebuild: run(){ rm lunchpool_mobile_onboarding-*.$2; expo build:$1; npm run binary$1; }; run
scripts.binary: run(){ rm lunchpool_mobile_onboarding-*.$1; curl -O $(npm run -s url $1); }; run
scripts.usbAndroid: adb -s $(npm run -s device) install $(npm run -s url apk) || echo 'no device found, check usb debugging, or apk file exists';
